tasks.title: Implement Token Saving Strategy
tasks.description: Review and implement optimizations from ScaleUP Media guide: 1) Route heartbeats to Haiku/Sonnet instead of Opus, 2) Skip MEMORY.md on heartbeats, 3) Consider Ollama for heartbeats, 4) Set budget limits. Biggest win: model routing for heartbeats (50-80% savings).
